Basic: 

$('#basic').slider()

Disabled: 

$('#disabled').slider({disabled: true});

Custom Colors: 

$('#customColors').slider({
    colors: {lower: 'red', upper: 'green'},
});

Only One Color: 

$('#customUpperColor').slider({
    colors: {upper: 'green'},
});

Min/Max/Step: 

$('#minMaxStep').slider({
    min: 10,
    max: 20,
    step: 2,
    value: 12
})

With methods: 

$('#selector').slider({
    onInit: function (slider) {
        $('#selectorValue').text('init: ' + slider.value);
    },
    onSlide: function (slider) {
        $('#selectorValue').text('slided: ' + slider.value)
    },
    onChange: function (slider) {
        $('#selectorValue').text('change: ' + slider.value)
    },
    onDestroy: function (slider) {
        $('#selectorValue').text('destroyed');
    }
});

With labels: 

$('#withLabels').slider({
    max: 10,
    step: 2,
    value: 6,
    labels: true
});

With some labels: 

$('#withSomeLabels').slider({
    labels: [0, 25, 50, 100]
});

With custom labels: 

$('#withSomeLabels').slider({
    labels: [{index: 0, label: 'start'}, 25, 50, {index: 100, label: 'end'}]
});

With ticks: 

$('#withTicks').slider({
    max: 10,
    step: 2,
    value: 6,
    ticks: true
});

With Ticks and Custom Colors: 

$('#withTicksColors').slider({
    max: 10,
    step: 2,
    value: 6,
    ticks: true,
    colors: {lower: 'red', upper: 'green'}
});

With some ticks: 

$('#withSomeTicks').slider({
    ticks: [0, 25, 75, 100]
});

With ticks and labels: 

$('#withTicksAndLabels').slider({
    max: 10,
    step: 2,
    value: 6,
    labels: true,
    ticks: true
});
